programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A San Diego mother suddenly vanishes in 2014; nearly two years later, her body is found in the San Diego Bay, but medical examiners say she has only been dead for a month or two.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A nurse is gunned down in her home and detectives believe they have a clear suspect; as they delve deeper into the investigation new information leads them down a completely different path.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A thump heard by the children in a Carlsbad, Calif., home one summer morning is the first clue in a shocking mystery involving family secrets.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Key players in the case of Rod Covlin, a New York man who is found guilty of murdering his wife for her $5.3 million fortune and attempting to frame his then-teenage daughter, share their stories.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: As detectives investigate a mother of two's sudden disappearance, her friends and family reveal she feared she was being stalked.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When Tina Sandoval disappears, her parents and loved ones spend years searching for her; a secret she was keeping may lead to clues about what happened to her.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a Pennsylvania man who was convinced his messy divorce put a target on his back is found stabbed to death, his friends and family realize he was right all along in predicting his own gruesome murder.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A San Diego mother suddenly vanishes in 2014; nearly two years later, her body is found in the San Diego Bay, but medical examiners say she has only been dead for a month or two.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A nurse is gunned down in her home and detectives believe they have a clear suspect; as they delve deeper into the investigation new information leads them down a completely different path.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A woman finds herself on the wrong side of the law after she accuses her boyfriend of rape.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A luxury car salesman is asked by a beautiful former client to plan a murder.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When young mother and paramedic Annamarie Cochrane Rintala is found dead at the bottom of her basement stairs, it takes four trials and 13 years before justice is served.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Convicted murderer Drew Peterson speaks out about the murder of his third wife and the disappearance of his fourth wife in his first network TV interview in more than a decade; insiders close to the case speak out, including Stacy Peterson's sister.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: As a murder victim's sisters dedicate themselves to finding the killer, an unexpected source turns the case upside down.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When Dr. Teresa Sievers is found murdered in her kitchen, detectives struggle to find any leads until an unexpected tip changes everything; the woman who helped investigators speaks out.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After Tahereh Ghassemi disappears from the Louisiana home she shares with her adult son, detectives discover that she'd recently come into a great deal of money; the investigation reveals an astonishing plot with international implications.
